I am Arlkort."},{"lineNumber":101830,"originalJapaneseLine":"その立場にそむくことは出来ません","translatedEnglishLine":"I cannot betray that bully."},{"lineNumber":101834,"originalJapaneseLine":"あ、ぐっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, ugh..."},{"lineNumber":101835,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":101836,"originalJapaneseLine":"睨み合いが数秒続くと――","translatedEnglishLine":"The glaring contest seconds—"},{"lineNumber":101837,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐうううう……","translatedEnglishLine":"Guuuuu..."},{"lineNumber":101838,"originalJapaneseLine":"ボロコフの顔がドロドロと脂汗にまみれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Borokov's face became covered with greasy sweat."},{"lineNumber":101839,"originalJapaneseLine":"す、すんませんでしたー！","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I'm sorry!"},{"lineNumber":101840,"originalJapaneseLine":"……へ？","translatedEnglishLine":"...Huh?"},{"lineNumber":101841,"originalJapaneseLine":"ボロコフは勢いよく土下座をしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Borokov vigorously bowed deeply in apology."},{"lineNumber":101842,"originalJapaneseLine":"お、俺、ただ粋がってただけなんです！　","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I was just bluffing!"},{"lineNumber":101843,"originalJapaneseLine":"当時のことは謝りますから、","translatedEnglishLine":"I apologize for what happened back then,"},{"lineNumber":101844,"originalJapaneseLine":"げ、激戦地に送ったりしないで下さい！","translatedEnglishLine":"Please don't send me to the front lines!"},{"lineNumber":101845,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、当時イジメてた奴が上官になっちまって、","translatedEnglishLine":"The guy who bullied me back then became my superior officer,"},{"lineNumber":101846,"originalJapaneseLine":"お、俺もうどうしたらいいか分からなくて！","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I don't know what to do anymore!"},{"lineNumber":101847,"originalJapaneseLine":"とにかく、本当にあの！","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, truly, um!"},{"lineNumber":101848,"originalJapaneseLine":"す、すみませんでしたぁ！","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I'm so sorry!"},{"lineNumber":101849,"originalJapaneseLine":"ええっ……！？","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh...!?"},{"lineNumber":101850,"originalJapaneseLine":"あ、あのあの……とにかく、か、顔を上げて……","translatedEnglishLine":"Uh, um... anyway, p-please raise your head..."},{"lineNumber":101851,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":101852,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふん、やるじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph, not bad."},{"lineNumber":101853,"originalJapaneseLine":"草陰からこっそり覗いていたランスは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, who had been secretly watching from the bushes,"},{"lineNumber":101854,"originalJapaneseLine":"満足げにその場をガサガサと離れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"left the place with a pleased rustle."},{"lineNumber":101855,"originalJapaneseLine":"おや、総統……","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh my, Supreme Commander..."},{"lineNumber":101856,"originalJapaneseLine":"……頭に葉っぱが乗ってますけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"...You have a leaf on your head,"},{"lineNumber":101857,"originalJapaneseLine":"どこで何してたんですか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Where have you been and what were you doing?"},{"lineNumber":101858,"originalJapaneseLine":"む、そんなことはどうでもいい","translatedEnglishLine":"Mmph, that's not important."},{"lineNumber":101859,"originalJapaneseLine":"ウルザちゃん、クリームちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ulza-chan, Cream-chan."},{"lineNumber":101860,"originalJapaneseLine":"アールコートちゃんのことで相談だが……","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to consult with you about Arlkort-chan..."},{"lineNumber":101861,"originalJapaneseLine":"……と、こういうわけだから。","translatedEnglishLine":"...That's how it is."},{"lineNumber":101862,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのいじめっ子の奴はどうにかしておけ","translatedEnglishLine":"Do something about that bully."},{"lineNumber":101863,"originalJapaneseLine":"くすくす、心配なんですね","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, you're worried, aren't you?"},{"lineNumber":101864,"originalJapaneseLine":"むっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm..."},{"lineNumber":101865,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、そのことですか……","translatedEnglishLine":"But, about that matter..."},{"lineNumber":101866,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれ？　知ってたのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh? You knew about it?"},{"lineNumber":101867,"originalJapaneseLine":"様子がおかしかったので、","translatedEnglishLine":"Because their behavior was strange,"},{"lineNumber":101868,"originalJapaneseLine":"同じリーザスの人にそれとなく聞いて……","translatedEnglishLine":"I discreetly asked someone from Leazas..."},{"lineNumber":101869,"originalJapaneseLine":"過保護ですね……","translatedEnglishLine":"You're overprotective..."},{"lineNumber":101870,"originalJapaneseLine":"むむ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm..."},{"lineNumber":101871,"originalJapaneseLine":"クリームに目配せされ、ウルザは頷いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Cream gave a glance, and Ulza nodded."},{"lineNumber":101872,"originalJapaneseLine":"ええ、特に私達は何かする気はありません","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, we don't specifically intend to do anything."},{"lineNumber":101873,"originalJapaneseLine":"これで折れるほど、アールコートさんは","translatedEnglishLine":"Arlkort-san isn't the type to give in just from this."},{"lineNumber":101874,"originalJapaneseLine":"弱くはありませんよ","translatedEnglishLine":"She is not weak."},{"lineNumber":101875,"originalJapaneseLine":"信頼してるんだな……","translatedEnglishLine":"You trust her, huh..."},{"lineNumber":101876,"originalJapaneseLine":"ええ","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes."},{"lineNumber":101877,"originalJapaneseLine":"同じ職場の同僚です。","translatedEnglishLine":"We are colleagues at the same workplace."},{"lineNumber":101878,"originalJapaneseLine":"当然です","translatedEnglishLine":"That's only natural."},{"lineNumber":101879,"originalJapaneseLine":"それより、総統。","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, Supreme Commander,"},{"lineNumber":101880,"originalJapaneseLine":"何もしないでくださいね","translatedEnglishLine":"Please don't do anything."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対に譲りません」「なんだとぉ……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I absolutely won't give in." "What did you say...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てめっ……！
お、俺に逆らうってのか！？　アアン！？
なにを言われても……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No matter what is said to me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は自分の意思を変える気はありません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I have no intention of changing my mind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の私は、人類軍の総本拠地、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, I am a strategist working at the headquarters of the Human Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城で働く軍師、アールコートです。
その立場にそむくことは出来ません
毅然とした顔で、
ボロコフの眼光に怯えることもなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: without flinching from Borokov's piercing gaze,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アールコートが真正面からいじめっ子の顔を見返す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arlkort stared straight back at the bully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、ぐっ……
睨み合いが数秒続くと――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The glaring contest continued for several seconds—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐうううう……
ボロコフの顔がドロドロと脂汗にまみれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Borokov's face became covered with greasy sweat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: す、すんませんでしたー！
ボロコフは勢いよく土下座をしていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Borokov vigorously bowed deeply in apology.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お、俺、ただ粋がってただけなんです！
当時のことは謝りますから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I apologize for what happened back then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: げ、激戦地に送ったりしないで下さい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please don't send me to the front lines!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、当時イジメてた奴が上官になっちまって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The guy who bullied me back then became my superior officer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お、俺もうどうしたらいいか分からなくて！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I don't know what to do anymore!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく、本当にあの！
す、すみませんでしたぁ！
ええっ……！？
あ、あのあの……とにかく、か、顔を上げて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uh, um... anyway, p-please raise your head...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、やるじゃないか
草陰からこっそり覗いていたランスは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, who had been secretly watching from the bushes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満足げにその場をガサガサと離れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: left the place with a pleased rustle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おや、総統……
……頭に葉っぱが乗ってますけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...You have a leaf on your head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこで何してたんですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where have you been and what were you doing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: む、そんなことはどうでもいい
ウルザちゃん、クリームちゃん。
アールコートちゃんのことで相談だが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to consult with you about Arlkort-chan...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……と、こういうわけだから。
そのいじめっ子の奴はどうにかしておけ
くすくす、心配なんですね
むっ……
しかし、そのことですか……
あれ？　知ってたのか？
様子がおかしかったので、
同じリーザスの人にそれとなく聞いて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I discreetly asked someone from Leazas...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 過保護ですね……
むむ……
クリームに目配せされ、ウルザは頷いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cream gave a glance, and Ulza nodded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええ、特に私達は何かする気はありません
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, we don't specifically intend to do anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで折れるほど、アールコートさんは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arlkort-san isn't the type to give in just from this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱くはありませんよ
信頼してるんだな……
ええ
同じ職場の同僚です。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are colleagues at the same workplace.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当然です
それより、総統。
何もしないでくださいね

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
